features: THE CUTEST WAY TO PRACTICE DRESSING: Who knew getting ready could be so much fun? Curious kiddos can practice again and again with this dress toy for toddlers featuring 5 getting dressed activities
ZIP, ZIP, HOORAY!: Help this soft plush boy doll get ready for the day! Kids ages 2 and up will love practicing with zippers, buttons, shoelaces, and more
DOLLS FOR CARING CUDDLERS: Kids don’t all look the same—and neither should their dolls! Choose from 6 Dressy Kid dolls with different skin tones, hair colors, and accessories
READY TO GO (AND MACHINE WASHABLE): A great travel activity toy! And don’t worry: even if kids drag their Dressy Kid everywhere with them, you can pop it right in the washing machine
PLAY FOR PLANET: At Hasbro, we take pride in designing for the environment, so Playskool is committed to thoughtfully produced toys in virtually plastic-free packaging
body.description: Buttons and zippers and ties - oh, my! With so many things to discover about getting ready for a busy day, it helps to have a friend come along. This huggable Playskool Dressy Kid plush doll is a great dress toy for kids ages 2 and up to practice different getting dressed activities. They'll love practicing their motor skills by pulling the zipper up and down, tying the shoelace, buckling the belt, and more! This Dressy Kids boy doll makes a great travel activity for toddlers ages 24 months and up. Dressy Kids stuffed toys come in different skin tones and hair colors so kids can choose their favorite, and they’re machine washable for easy cleaning! Playskool and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cute little doll and great for learning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My great grandson love his new buddy! Exactly what I ordered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great size for a toddler, seems well made and great learning tool

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Kid's New Buddy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this doll for my 10-year-old nephew who has autism. As a New Year's gift, this was a hit. I wasn't sure if he would like his first doll, but he really does. My nephew enjoys playing with his "buddy" that's bigger than his other human toys. He likes practicing how to tie, button, and zip since it's in a more realistic manner compared to a non-human toy to practice motor skills on. This doll is darker than pictured, but plush as described. Also, there's only one button, zipper, and shoe to tie as pictured. Although, this toy is targeted at toddlers, this is good for kids with autism to sharpen their motor skills. I got this toy on sale with a coupon, so that's a bonus! If you do decide to get this item, get it while it's discounted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my grand son to help with learning. It is great quality and very cute. I do recommend this doll to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great early gift
reviews.reviewText: Great for teaching early milestones to grandkids. My kids had them when they were little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars disappointed in fabric color for skintone
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two dolls for my grandsons. I tried to get them to look as close to them as possible. I ordered one with dark brown hair(or black) and one with brown. They are both so cute but the one with brown hair has a much darker skin color than the picture on line. I dont know if thats the way he is supposed to be. sometimes dye lots are different.. please let me know, I would have prefered a doll to match his looks as much as possible. thank you. I wanted it for this coming friday as a gift. Thank you
So cute and great for babies to practice buttons, zippers, Velcro, shoe laces, and belts.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very soft and cuddly good for a two year old or any age.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this doll for my great nephew cause it was his one year old brothers bday and I didn’t want him too be left out.He really loves it and carries it everywhere.He can learn too tie the shoe unzip the jacket and do the button up and it’s so soft and cuddly.My great nephew is two and a half.
Awesome toy to learn buttons,buckles,zippers... Love the velcro on hat. Doll is darker skinned than picture shows... But he is still very cute
It was smaller than expected and unfortunately the great grandson hates it. Good concept so wbill save for great grand daughter's. Bigger is better though.
